user.title: Configure Homie Energy Core
user.description:
Select the sensors that represent your energy totals.

You may select multiple sensors per category.
Only select sensors with unit kWh or Wh. Do not select W (power) sensors.

data.imported_entities: Which sensor(s) measure energy imported from the grid?
data.exported_entities: Which sensor(s) measure energy exported to the grid?
data.produced_entities: Which sensor(s) measure total energy produced?
data.battery_charge_entities: Which sensor(s) measure total battery charge energy?
data.battery_discharge_entities: Which sensor(s) measure total battery discharge energy?
data.co2_intensity_entity: Which sensor provides CO₂ intensity (g CO₂-eq/kWh)?

error.invalid_unit: Only sensors with unit kWh or Wh are allowed. Do not select W (power) sensors.
